BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: The amount of financial liabilities assumed (as defined) which have been recognized as of the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Property, Plant, and Equipment
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: The amount of property, plant, and equipment recognized as of the acquisition date.

CashCollateralForBorrowedSecurities.label: Cash Collateral for Borrowed Securities
CashCollateralForBorrowedSecurities.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of cash collateral held for borrowed securities, for which the cash is restricted as to withdrawal or usage.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Loss Position
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.description: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), in unrealized loss position without allowance for credit loss.

DeferredTaxAssetsDerivativeInstruments.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Derivative Instruments
DeferredTaxAssetsDerivativeInstruments.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from derivative instruments.

DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards, Domestic
DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible domestic operating loss carryforwards. Excludes state and local operating loss carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Employee Benefits
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from employee benefits, classified as other.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Reserves and Accruals, Allowance for Doubtful Accounts
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseReser.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from the allowance for doubtful accounts.

DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Valuation Allowance
DeferredTaxAssetsValuationAllowance.description: Amount of deferred tax assets for which it is more likely than not that a tax benefit will not be realized.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDerivatives.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Derivatives
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDerivatives.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from derivatives.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesLeasingArrangement.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Leasing Arrangements
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesLeasingArrangement.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from leasing arrangements.

DeferredTaxLiabilityNotRecognizedAmountO.label: Deferred Tax Liability Not Recognized, Amount of Unrecognized Deferred Tax Liability, Bad Debt Reserve for Tax Purposes of Qualified Lender
DeferredTaxLiabilityNotRecognizedAmountO.description: Amount of deferred tax liability not recognized because of the exceptions to comprehensive recognition of deferred taxes related to bad debt reserve for tax purposes of a qualified lender.

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvances.label: Federal Home Loan Bank Advances
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvances.description: Amount of Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank) advances to member financial institutions.

FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesInterestRate.label: Federal Home Loan Bank, Advances, Interest Rate
FederalHomeLoanBankAdvancesInterestRate.description: Interest rate of advances made and reported by Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLBank).

FinancingReceivablePurchasedWithCreditDe.label: Financing Receivable, Purchased with Credit Deterioration, Allowance for Credit Loss at Acquisition Date
FinancingReceivablePurchasedWithCreditDe.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss at acquisition date of financing receivable purchased with credit deterioration.

GainsLossesOnSalesOfInvestmentRealEstate.label: Gains (Losses) on Sales of Investment Real Estate
GainsLossesOnSalesOfInvestmentRealEstate.description: The net gain (loss) resulting from sales and other disposals of real estate owned for investment purposes.

GoodwillImpairmentLoss.label: Goodwill, Impairment Loss
GoodwillImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of loss from the write-down of an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GoodwillPeriodIncreaseDecrease.label: Goodwill, Period Increase (Decrease)
GoodwillPeriodIncreaseDecrease.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operation, attributable to nondeductible expense for award under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, expense determined to be nondeductible upon grant or after for award under share-based payment arrangement.

IncomeTaxReconciliationPriorYearIncomeTa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Prior Year Income Taxes, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationPriorYearIncomeTa.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to revisions of previously reported income tax expense (benefit).

InterestBearingDomesticDepositCertificat.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Certificates of Deposits
InterestBearingDomesticDepositCertificat.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic certificate of deposit liabilities.

InterestBearingDomesticDepositChecking.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Checking
InterestBearingDomesticDepositChecking.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic checking deposit liabilities.

InterestBearingDomesticDepositMoneyMarke.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Money Market
InterestBearingDomesticDepositMoneyMarke.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic money market demand account deposit liabilities.

InterestBearingDomesticDepositSavings.label: Interest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Savings
InterestBearingDomesticDepositSavings.description: Amount of interest-bearing domestic savings deposit liabilities. Saving deposits bear interest and have no stated maturity.

InvestmentIncomeInterest.label: Investment Income, Interest
InvestmentIncomeInterest.description: Amount before accretion (amortization) of purchase discount (premium) of interest income on nonoperating securities.

NoninterestBearingDomesticDepositCheckin.label: Noninterest-bearing Domestic Deposit, Checking
NoninterestBearingDomesticDepositCheckin.description: Amount of noninterest-bearing domestic checking deposit liabilities.

NumberOfOperatingSegments.label: Number of Operating Segments
NumberOfOperatingSegments.description: Number of operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an enterprise: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same enterprise), (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the enterprise's chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. An operating segment may engage in business activities for which it has yet to earn revenues, for example, start-up operations may be operating segments before earning revenues.

NumberOfRealEstateProperties.label: Number of Real Estate Properties
NumberOfRealEstateProperties.description: The number of real estate properties owned as of the balance sheet date.

PaymentsForProceedsFromBusinessesAndInte.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Businesses and Interest in Affiliates
PaymentsForProceedsFromBusinessesAndInte.description: The net cash outflow or inflow associated with the acquisition or sale of a business segment during the period.

PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.label: Payments to Acquire Productive Assets
PaymentsToAcquireProductiveAssets.description: The cash outflow for purchases of and capital improvements on property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Productive Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfProductiveAssets.description: The cash inflow from the sale of property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.label: Proceeds from Sale of Real Estate
ProceedsFromSaleOfRealEstate.description: Cash received for the sale of real estate that is not part of an investing activity during the current period.

RealEstateHeldforsale.label: Real Estate Held-for-sale
RealEstateHeldforsale.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of investments in land and buildings held for sale, excluding real estate considered to be inventory of the entity.

ServicingAsset.label: Servicing Asset
ServicingAsset.description: Aggregate amount of servicing assets that are subsequently measured at fair value and servicing assets that are subsequently measured using the amortization method.

ServicingAssetAtFairValueAdditions.label: Servicing Asset at Fair Value, Additions
ServicingAssetAtFairValueAdditions.description: The value of new servicing assets, subsequently measured at fair value, acquired or created during the current period through purchases or from transfers of financial assets.

TimeDepositsWeightedAverageInterestRateM.label: Time Deposits, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturities Year Five
TimeDepositsWeightedAverageInterestRateM.description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities greater than four years, but five years or less.

TimeDepositsWeightedAverageInterestRateM.label: Time Deposits, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturities Year Four
TimeDepositsWeightedAverageInterestRateM.description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities greater than three years, but four years or less.

TimeDepositsWeightedAverageInterestRateM.label: Time Deposits, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturities Year One
TimeDepositsWeightedAverageInterestRateM.description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities of one year or less.

TimeDepositsWeightedAverageInterestRateM.label: Time Deposits, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturities Year Three
TimeDepositsWeightedAverageInterestRateM.description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities greater than two years, but three years or less.

TimeDepositsWeightedAverageInterestRateM.label: Time Deposits, Weighted Average Interest Rate, Maturities Year Two
TimeDepositsWeightedAverageInterestRateM.description: Weighted average interest rate for time deposits held by the entity with maturities greater than one year, but two years or less.

ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecogni.label: Valuation Allowance for Impairment of Recognized Servicing Assets, Balance
ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecogni.description: Reflects the estimated amount of impairment as of the balance sheet date of recognized servicing assets that are being amortized in proportion to and over the period of estimated net servicing income or loss.

ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecogni.label: Valuation Allowance for Impairment of Recognized Servicing Assets, Additions for Expenses
ValuationAllowanceForImpairmentOfRecogni.description: Amount of increase in the valuation allowance for impairment of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer from charges to expense.

WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositCertif.label: Weighted Average Rate Domestic Deposit, Certificates of Deposit
WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositCertif.description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic certificates of deposit liabilities.

WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositChecki.label: Weighted Average Rate Domestic Deposit, Checking
WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositChecki.description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic checking deposit liabilities.

WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositMoneyM.label: Weighted Average Rate Domestic Deposit, Money Market
WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositMoneyM.description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic money market demand account deposit liabilities.

WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositSaving.label: Weighted Average Rate Domestic Deposit, Savings
WeightedAverageRateDomesticDepositSaving.description: The weighted average interest rate for domestic savings deposit liabilities.

DerivativeCollateralObligationToReturnSe.label: Derivative, Collateral, Obligation to Return Securities
DerivativeCollateralObligationToReturnSe.description: Amount of obligation to return securities collateral under master netting arrangements that have not been offset against derivative assets.

HeldToMaturitySecuritiesTransferredToTra.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Transfer to Trading, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
HeldToMaturitySecuritiesTransferredToTra.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings from transfer of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading). Includes other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) previously recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.label: OCI, Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Transfer to Held-to-Maturity, Adjustment from AOCI for Amortization of Gain (Loss), after Tax
OciDebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleTransfe.description: Amount, after tax, of adjustment from accumulated other comprehensive income (loss) for amortization of gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale) from transfer to investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity).

DefinedBenefitPlanRecognizedNetGainLossD.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Net Periodic Benefit Cost (Credit), Gain (Loss) Due to Curtailment
DefinedBenefitPlanRecognizedNetGainLossD.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit from event reducing expected years of future service of present employees or eliminating accrual of defined benefits for some or all future services of present employees.

HeldtomaturitySecuritiesTransferredToTra.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Transfer to Trading, Unrealized Gain (Loss), Excluding Other-than-temporary Impairment
HeldtomaturitySecuritiesTransferredToTra.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings from transfer of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), to investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in net income (trading). Excludes other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI) previously recognized in other comprehensive income (OCI).

TreasuryStockCommonValue.label: Treasury Stock, Common, Value
TreasuryStockCommonValue.description: Amount allocated to previously issued common shares repurchased by the issuing entity and held in treasury.

DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAccruedInter.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-Maturity, Accrued Interest, Writeoff
DebtSecuritiesHeldToMaturityAccruedInter.description: Amount of writeoff of accrued interest on investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity) recognized by reversing interest income.

LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.label: Loans Receivable, Fair Value Disclosure
LoansReceivableFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of loan receivable, including, but not limited to, mortgage loans held for investment, finance receivables held for investment, policy loans on insurance contracts.

ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.label: Proceeds from Sale of Property Held-for-sale
ProceedsFromSaleOfPropertyHeldForSale.description: The cash inflow from the sale of formerly productive land held for sale, anything permanently fixed to it, including buildings, structures on it, and so forth.

ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValue.label: Servicing Asset at Amortized Cost
ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValue.description: Amortized amount of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValueAdditions.label: Servicing Asset at Amortized Cost, Additions
ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValueAdditions.description: Amount of additions from purchases, assumption or transfer to contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValueAmortizati.label: Servicing Asset at Amortized Cost, Amortization
ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValueAmortizati.description: Amount of amortization of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValueDisposals.label: Servicing Asset at Amortized Cost, Disposals
ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValueDisposals.description: Amount conveyed to unrelated parties of contract to contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.

ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValueFairValue.label: Servicing Asset at Amortized Cost, Fair Value
ServicingAssetAtAmortizedValueFairValue.description: Fair value of contract to service financial assets under which the benefits of servicing are expected to more than adequately compensate the servicer.
